s_title: Ganbare Goemon 3 - Shishi Juurokubee no Karakuri Manjigatame
s_synopsis: Third title in the Ganbare Goemon series of platform/adventure games which cast you as the heroic Goemon as he attempts to save feudal Japan from all sorts of wacky evildoers. This time around, a time-travelling machine threatens all of Japan and thus Goemon and co. must jump into the future to stop the machine.
